Item.body_html:
You have been assigned a new workflow activity in Aras Innovator. Please open the Aras app above to complete the activity.

${Item[1]/name}
${Item[2]/item_number}
${Item[@type="ItemType"]/name}
${Item[3]/database}
${Item[3]/host}
InBasket
Item.query_string: <Item type="Activity" id="${Item/ActivityId}" action="get" select="name,message"/> <Item type="${Item/@type}" id="${Item/@id}" action="get" select="item_number"/> <Item type="ItemType" action="GetUrl" select="database,url"/> <Item type="ItemType" id="${Item/@typeId}" action="get" select="name"/>
Item.subject: New Assignment (${Item[2]/item_number})
Item.name: O365 Outlook Workflow Notification
